item.title: tmux
item.description:
Isn’t tmux just wonderful? Start sessions with processes and them attach to them at a later time. See this guide; A Quick and Easy Guide to tmux
Memo; $ tmux #start new session $ tmux ls #list available sessions $ tmux attach -t 0 #attach to session 0, listed from tmux ls $ tumux kill-session -t 0 #kill session 0
Key bindings; C-b % #split pane vertically C-b "
